name: flag_or_filter
description: Flag or Filter (i.e., remove) Components or transitions that do not pass the QC.

name: report_xic
description: Embed an image of the XIC in the QC report.

name: report_tic
description: Embed an image of the TIC in the QC report.

name: flag_or_filter
description: Flag or Filter (i.e., remove) Components or transitions that do not pass the QC.

name: report_xic
description: Embed an image of the XIC in the QC report.

name: report_tic
description: Embed an image of the TIC in the QC report.

name: acquisition_start
description: The start time to use when extracting out the spectra windows from the MSExperiment

name: acquisition_end
description: The end time to use when extracting out the spectra windows from the MSExperiment

name: resolution
description: The instrument settings: resolution

name: max_mz
description: Maximum mz

name: bin_step
description: The size of the step to recalculated the bin size used for adding up spectra along the time axis

name: frame_length
description: SavitzkyGolayFilter parameter. The number of subsequent data points used for smoothing

name: polynomial_order
description: SavitzkyGolayFilter parameter. Order or the polynomial that is fitted

name: sne:window
description: SignalToNoiseEstimatorMedianRapid parameter. Signal-to-noise estimation window (in mz)

name: write_convex_hull
description: Whether to write out all points of all features into the featureXML

name: mass_error_value
description: Tolerance allowed for accurate mass search.

name: mass_error_unit
description: Unit of mass error (ppm or Da)

name: ionization_mode
description: Positive or negative ionization mode? If 'auto' is used, the first feature of the input map must contain the meta-value 'scan_polarity'. If its missing, the tool will exit with error.

name: isotopic_similarity
description: Computes a similarity score for each hit (only if the feature exhibits at least two isotopic mass traces).

name: db:mapping
description: Database input file(s), containing four tab-separated columns of identifier, name, SMILES, INCHI.  The identifier should match with mapping file. SMILES and INCHI are reported in the output, but not used otherwise. By default CHEMISTRY/HMDB2StructMapping.tsv in OpenMS/share is used! If empty, the default will be used.

name: db:struct
description: Database input file(s), containing four tab-separated columns of identifier, name, SMILES, INCHI.  The identifier should match with mapping file. SMILES and INCHI are reported in the output, but not used otherwise. By default CHEMISTRY/HMDB2StructMapping.tsv in OpenMS/share is used! If empty, the default will be used.

name: positive_adducts
description: This file contains the list of potential positive adducts that will be looked for in the database. Edit the list if you wish to exclude/include adducts. By default CHEMISTRY/PositiveAdducts.tsv in OpenMS/share is used.

name: negative_adducts
description: This file contains the list of potential negative adducts that will be looked for in the database. Edit the list if you wish to exclude/include adducts. By default CHEMISTRY/NegativeAdducts.tsv in OpenMS/share is used.

name: use_feature_adducts
description: Whether to filter AMS candidates mismatching available feature adduct annotation.

name: keep_unidentified_masses
description: Keep features that did not yield any DB hit.

name: mzTab:exportIsotopeIntensities
description: [featureXML input only] Export column with available isotope trace intensities (opt_global_MTint)

name: n_thread
description: Number of threads to use
